com.google.android.gm.NonRestorableTextV.android:text: Gmail is built on the idea that email can be more intuitive, efficient, and useful. And maybe even fun.

TextView.android:text: Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more.
Touch a sender image to select that conversation.
No labels have been set for this account.
To view conversations in the widget, sync this label.
You are about to go to the Settings app, where you can add and remove Google Accounts.
Mail categories group messages of the same type for reading all at once.
You can enable and disable categories in settings.

"When you sync more mail, your offline and local search experience will improve, but the initial sync may take a few minutes and consume bandwidth. It's recommended you sync the last 30 days of mail."
"This account isn't set up to sync automatically. Touch " to sync mail once, or to set up this account to sync mail automatically.
To view conversations, sync this folder.
"This account isn't set up to sync automatically. Touch " to sync mail once, or to set up this account to sync mail automatically.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Download attachments
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Auto-download attachments to recent messages via Wi-Fi

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Cross-device notification sync
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notifications will require the ^us label, so viewing your inbox on another device (or platform) will dismiss your inbox notification on this device. Dismissing a notification will clear ^us, causing it dismiss everywhere.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Alternative parallax speed
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Causes attachment previews to parallax at an alternative speed. Restart the app to take effect.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Alternative parallax direction
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Causes attachment previews to parallax at an alternative direction. Restart the app to take effect.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sender image
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show beside name in conversation list

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto-fit messages
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Shrink messages to fit the screen

Preference.android:summary: "Person-to-person conversations and messages that don't appear in other categories. To receive all mail in one inbox, uncheck all others."

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Messages from social networks, media sharing sites, online dating services
Deals, offers, and other marketing email
Personal, auto-generated updates, including confirmations, receipts, bills, and statements
Messages from online groups, discussion boards, and mailing lists
